name: Boxilere
description:
Box man goes to free a random place from the curse.

Ancient architects were quite weird please forgive them for bad dungeons :(

Also, if you like, make a monster clip through the wall or get an unbeatable dungeon, just press R to go teleport to the next dungeon as it likely was a trap.

Please leave R alone :(

Also, don't go off the edge in the boss fight you hp will be lowered to 3 without saying a word.

WASDMOVEMENTLeft-clickPick up or useRight-clickDashWhat can be used to hurt them monsters?Dash through them or Shoot them?Am I an idiot?Yes and no :)

Help this box man.

Kill those red things?

No deep dark lore here :)
